original_title: Japanese Erotica: Five Films on Love and Sex from the Japanese Underground of the Experimental Cinema
overview: A program of five films on love and sex from the Japanese underground of the experimental cinema, assembled by avant-garde cineaste Takahiko Iimura, and shown at the American Cinematheque from January 19 to 25, 1967.
title: Japanese Erotica: Five Films on Love and Sex from the Japanese Underground of the Experimental Cinema
